alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Franklin; Union (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 6:42PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN FRANKLIN COUNTY IN SOUTHEASTERN INDIANA, SOUTHERN UNION AND SOUTHEASTERN FAYETTE COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL INDIANA THROUGH 715 PM EDT... At 642 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Brookville, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Liberty, Salem, Blooming Grove, Dunlapsville, Alquina, Whitewater State Park, Charlottesville, Mounds State Recreation Area, Billingsville, Cottage Grove and Everton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
